definition: prop/support (for weight)/rest (e.g. arm rest)/thanks to/to hold in one's hand/to support in one's palm/to give/to base/to commit/to set/torr (unit of pressure)
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat

sentences.english: Moto is deadvert. This is the era of Apple.
sentences.chinese: 摩托羅拉曾經死了，這是蘋果的時代。

sentences.english: Porcelain, theme song of the ad "MOTO" cell phone in 1998.
sentences.chinese: “陶瓷”，1998年摩托羅拉手機廣告歌。

sentences.english: MOTOROLA the 2005 global sales totaled $368 billion.
sentences.chinese: 摩托羅拉2005年的全球銷售總額爲368億美元。

sentences.english: Innovation is a recognized part of Motorola's 75-year heritage.
sentences.chinese: 年來，摩托羅拉一直秉承着創新的傳統。

sentences.english: Or will MMV just cease to exist.
sentences.chinese: 抑或摩托羅拉移動風險投資將不復存在？

sentences.english: For one, I don't need a new phone. Except for some reception problems, my StarTac works fine.
sentences.chinese: 我不需要新手機，除了面子上的問題，我的摩托羅拉。

sentences.english: Motorola H17 Block, hello to " you " on the other side "of" technology and private action.
sentences.chinese: 摩托羅拉H17座歡迎您到另一面在科技與你的作品。

sentences.english: A nano-emissive display is under development by Motorola.
sentences.chinese: 納發射顯示器正在由摩托羅拉進行開發。

sentences.english: Moto is dead. This is the era of Apple.
sentences.chinese: 摩托羅拉已經死了，這是蘋果的時代。

sentences.english: I look forward to welcoming Motorolans to our family of Googlers.
sentences.chinese: 我期待着歡迎摩托羅拉到我們家的谷歌。
摩托羅拉隨後進行了反訴。

sentences.english: Microsoft is suing Motorola over Android too.
sentences.chinese: 微軟也正因安卓系統而起訴摩托羅拉。

sentences.english: It is actually a battery powered atomizer which uses a Motorola chip.
sentences.chinese: 它實際上是採用霧化器的使用摩托羅拉芯片電池。

sentences.english: Unicom's website has since started taking pre-orders for the Motorola device.
sentences.chinese: 在那之後，聯通網站已開始接受摩托羅拉手機的預購。

sentences.english: HTC and Motorola have adapted to reflect consumer needs in a very positive way.
sentences.chinese: HTC和摩托羅拉已經對消費者的需求做出積極響應。

sentences.english: Still, the Motorola is a decent option at a fair price.
sentences.chinese: 儘管如此，摩托羅拉價格公道，算是個不錯的選擇。

definition: lit. to set up a separate kitchen (idiom); to start from scratch/back to square one/to start of on a new path

pinyin: Guo2 ji4 Ao4 lin2 pi3 ke4 Wei3 yuan2 hui4
